title: Seoul for the Soul!
description:
Giancarlo shares travel tips after his amazing, family trip to Seoul, South Korea. Plus, small steps to help sustain your weight, a Love Doctor follow-up & workout emails.

Start your FREE 7 day trial for Jillian’s My Fitness App at https://go.jillianmichaels.com/WNt1rL7uyZ

Send us your brief question at jillianpodcast@gmail.com
